alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; North Walton; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:38PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jackson, northern Bay, northwestern Calhoun, southeastern Walton, southern Holmes and Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 430 PM EDT/330 PM CDT/... At 338 PM EDT/238 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles east of Marianna to 10 miles south of Chipley to 8 miles southwest of Vernon to 14 miles east of Eglin Air Force Base. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Chipley, Bonifay, Marianna, De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Bradford, Live Oak, Malone, Sneads, Freeport, Cottondale, Grand Ridge, Greenwood, Ponce De Leon, Altha, Alford, Caryville, Wausau and Westville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; North Walton; South Walton; Washington
